sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/services/api-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent{ posts: any = []; constructor(private api: ApiService) { this.api.getMainFeed().subscribe((data: any) => { this.posts = data.posts; }); } }
